lead_paragraph: STEELE--Robert Lewis, 75, died in Florida on February 5. Born in Brooklyn, New York. Graduate of Lafayette High School, Brooklyn College and received MFA from Yale University. Proud father to G.G., Maggie and Bobby; caring stepfather to Timothy and Calvin; loving husband to Florine; and dear brother to Judith Stelboum. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  STEELE, ROBERT LEWIS
